member.name: T:EaseyEase.EaseyTimer
member.summary: Used to keep track of timings for an ease

member.name: M:EaseyEase.EaseyTimer.#ctor(System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new EaseyTimer with the given duration

member.name: M:EaseyEase.EaseyTimer.#ctor(System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new EaseyTimer with the given duration, starting at the given time

member.name: M:EaseyEase.Easey.Ease(EaseyEase.Easey.EaseType,System.Single,System.Single,EaseyEase.EaseyTimer)
member.summary: Ease a float between two values
member.returns: Float between _a and _b, based on the time between the start and end (as defined by the given EaseyTimer), using the given ease type

member.name: M:EaseyEase.Easey.Ease(EaseyEase.Easey.EaseType,UnityEngine.Vector3,UnityEngine.Vector3,EaseyEase.EaseyTimer)
member.summary: Ease a vector3 between two values
member.returns: Vector3 between _a and _b, based on the time between the start and end (as defined by the given EaseyTimer), using the given ease type

member.name: M:EaseyEase.Easey.Ease(EaseyEase.Easey.EaseType,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Ease a float between two values
member.returns: Float between _a and _b, based on the given time _t

member.name: M:EaseyEase.Easey.Ease(EaseyEase.Easey.EaseType,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)

member.returns: Float between _a and _b, based on the the given _t through _startT and _startT plus _d
